hero_title: Never do an activity alone again!
hero_sub: MeeDo connects you with people nearby who want to do the same thing, right now or later - from sports and gym sessions to study groups and hobbies, we got an activity waiting for you!
hero_anthem: Find your travel buddies • Share plans • Go IRL
hero_cta_note: Beta list closes soon - secure your spot
hero_flash1_desc: See what people around you are doing this hour.
hero_flash2_desc: Drop a pin, set vibes, and start a temporary chat.
why_lead: Find companions for your next activity - quickly, safely, and without awkward coordination. Create or join activities based on time, location, and interests.
why_card1_desc: Browse a live map of things happening around you: sports, study, coffee, and more.
why_card2_desc: Post what you want to do, when, and where. Set capacity and preferences.
why_card3_desc: Profiles and preferences help you find the right match for each activity.
app_lead: Here are a few early screens. The product is under active development.
feat_create_title: Create an activity in just 4 steps
feat_create_desc: Spin up a plan in seconds. Choose who sees it, set vibe, time, and place - no messy chats, just action.
feat_create_point1: Pick who sees it and the vibe - public, friends, or invite-only.
feat_create_point2: Drop a pin, set time and capacity, and you're live.
feat_explore_desc: Browse a live map of nearby activities and jump in when the timing fits.
feat_explore_point1: Filter by time, vibe, and distance to find the right crew fast.
feat_explore_point2: Tap to join and chat instantly with people already heading there.
feat_discover_title: Stay in sync with your circle
feat_discover_desc: Keep up with friends and trusted groups so plans happen effortlessly.
feat_discover_point1: See what your circle is doing and RSVP without endless coordination.
feat_discover_point2: Build momentum with quick reactions and chats that expire after the event.
feat_track_desc: Your personal dashboard for every activity you've hosted or joined. Stay organized and relive your best memories with a complete summary.
feat_chat_desc: Forget cluttering your messaging apps. Every activity gets a dedicated chat that disappears 24 hours after the event ends. Simple, private, and effective.
feat_comm_desc: Easily add people you meet at activities and build your circle of doers. Real connections happen in the real world, not just online.
cta_launch: Launching soon. Want early access? Become a beta tester and help us shape MeeDo!
team_title: We are building MeeDo for doers
team_lead: We combine product, design, and community-building experience to make spontaneous social activities simple and safe.
nicola_p1: Nicola is pursuing a Master’s in Electronic Engineering in Zurich, specializing in embedded systems.
nicola_p2: He’s passionate about sports - especially wingfoiling and sailing - and teaches sailing each year at the Circolo Velico Lago di Lugano.
nicola_p3: A curious traveler who loves meeting new people, he spent two months in Australia to level up his English and completed a three‑month thesis exchange in Boston at a Harvard Medical School lab.
nicola_p4: Above all, he loves doing activities with friends - exactly the kind of moments MeeDo makes easier.
samuele_p1: Samuele lives in Ticino and Lausanne. He began his journey as a polymechanic (AFC), before dedicating himself to Sports Science at the University of Fribourg. He is now completing a Master’s in Sports Performance at the University of Lausanne.
samuele_p2: Sociable and full of energy, in his free time he teaches snowboarding and practices gymnastics. He feels at ease in community environments and loves creating opportunities to bring people together through shared activities with friends - a lifestyle that fully embodies MeeDo’s mission.
cfo_p1: We’re an early-stage startup with a big vision, and we’re looking for key builders to take MeeDo from a small project to a successful global company. We believe that every role requires the right person and specific skills!
cfo_p2: If you’re excited to shape the product with us from day one, we’d love to talk.
team_collab_title: Like the project and want to help?
team_collab_p1: Beyond core team members, we are always looking for partners, advisors, or simply testers.
team_collab_p2: If you believe in our vision and want to help us grow - connecting people through real-world activities - you can support us in many ways, from consulting and services to collaborations!
project_title: A social utility for spontaneous activities
project_lead: MeeDo reduces the friction of finding people to do things with - solving loneliness and coordination fatigue by matching intent, time, and location.
proj_prob_desc: People want to be more active but often lack companions at the right time and place. Group chats are noisy; scheduling apps are rigid; communities are fragmented.
proj_sol_desc: A lightweight way to create and join activities in seconds, discover nearby options on a map, and connect safely through profiles and preferences.
proj_who_desc: Students, young professionals, hobbyists, travelers - anyone who wants to do more, together.
roadmap_lead: Our plan to bring MeeDo to life and grow the community.
phase1_desc: Building the core experience: create activity, join nearby, and chat. Initial testing with our closed beta group.
phase2_desc: Public release on App Store. We'll gather initial feedback to refine the app and ensure people love it!
phase3_desc: Once validated our vision, we'll raise seed capital to fuel our growth. Every great project needs the right resources to become a unicorn.
phase4_desc: Combining our roadmap with user feedback to ensure rapid growth and a product that truly satisfies our community.
phase5_desc: Don't worry ;) No paywalls. We're designing a win-win model that adds value for everyone without charging users to use MeeDo.
phase6_desc: Scaling up operations, expanding the team, and taking MeeDo to international markets.
phase7_desc: The ultimate goal: becoming a public company owned by the community that helped build it.
tech_lead: Built for performance and scale using modern, reliable tools.
tech_rn_desc: We use React Native to deliver a truly native experience on both iOS and Android from a single codebase. This allows us to iterate fast and maintain feature parity across platforms.
tech_supabase_desc: Our backend is powered by Supabase, providing us with a robust PostgreSQL database, real-time subscriptions for chat and live updates, and secure authentication out of the box.
proj_feedback1: Have feedback or want to collaborate?
inv_title: Building the social layer for real-world activities
inv_lead: MeeDo is a consumer social utility that unlocks spontaneous participation in everyday activities. We’re pre-launch and actively validating with early adopters.
inv_market_desc: Millions of socially active students, expats, and young professionals crave offline plans yet still rely on chat apps or rigid event tools. MeeDo targets this underserved gap across European cities with a dedicated layer for spontaneous small group activities.
inv_prod_desc: MeeDo is the go-to app for real-life plans: create or join an activity with filters for time, place, and vibe. Group chats are created automatically when you create or join an activity, keeping coordination simple and fast.
inv_gtm_desc: We seed high-density hubs such as campuses, gyms, and coworking spaces through storytelling on Instagram and TikTok, local ambassadors, and city challenges. Community and expat-media partnerships amplify word of mouth until each market runs on MeeDo.
inv_intro_desc: You can view our Lean Canvas below for a high-level overview. We share our full Pitch Deck and detailed roadmap during intro meetings with potential partners.
supporter_desc: Do you want to support the project to see MeeDo become a reality? Become a sponsor!
404_desc: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
